name: core-geometric-system-mcp
description: MCP server exposing core geometric computation tools.

tools.name: compute_circle_area
tools.description: Compute the exact area of a circle from its radius.

tools.name: compute_circumference
tools.description: Compute the exact circumference of a circle from its radius.

tools.name: compute_circle_segment_area
tools.description: Compute the area of a circle segment from its height and the radius of its parent circle.

tools.name: compute_circle_segment_area
tools.description: Compute the area of a circle segment from its height and chord length.

tools.name: compute_circle_segment_area
tools.description: Compute the area of a circle segment from its chord length and the radius of its parent circle.

tools.name: compute_cone_surfac_area
tools.description: Compute the exact surface area of a cone from its height and bottom radius.

tools.name: compute_sphere_volume
tools.description: Compute the exact volume of a sphere from its radius.

tools.name: compute_spherical_cap_volume
tools.description: Approximate the volume of a spherical cap from its height and its bottom radius.

tools.name: compute_cone_volume
tools.description: Calculate the exact volume of a cone from its height and its bottom radius.

tools.name: compute_pyramid_volume
tools.description: Calculate the exact volume of a pyramid from its height and the number and the length of its bottom edges.

tools.name: compute_frustum_pyramid_volume
tools.description: Calculate the exact volume of a frustum pyramid from its height and the number and the length of its bottom and top edges.

tools.name: compute_frustum_cone_volume
tools.description: Calculate the exact volume of a frustum cone from its height and its bottom and top radii.

tools.name: compute_tetrahedron_volume
tools.description: Compute the exact volume of a tetrahedron from its edge length.
